attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: NO SMOKING SHOULD NOT HAVE BEEN A TOTAL BLANKET BAN BUT THE OWNER OF THE PREMESIS SHOULD HAVE HAD THE RIGHT TO CHOOSE,IF NON SMOKERS DON'T WANT TO GO INTO THE PREMESIS THAT CHOICE IS THEIRS AS IS WATCHING A TV PROGRAM THEY CAN ALWAYS TURN IT OVER,GREAT BRITAIN AS ALWAYS FOUGHT COMMUNISM AND THIS IS COMMUNISM TAKING AWAY ONE OF OUR CIVIL RIGHTS,HARD WORKING BRITS LIKE TO HAVE A HARD EARNED DRINK AFTER WORK ALONG WITH A CIGARETTE,SO WHY SHOULD SMOKERS SUFFER.LOTS OF SMALL BUSINESS'S ARE GOING TO BE FORCED TO CLOSE BECAUSE OF THE BAN,THE GOVERNMENT AS ALWAYS ENCOURAGED SMALL BUSINESS'S SO WHY LET THIS BAN GO THROUGH.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
